text: Munamenye ko mu by'ukuri, icyo ari cyo cyose mufashe bunyago, kimwe cya gatanu cyacyokiba ari icya Allah, Intumwa, abafitanye isano rya hafi (n' Intumwa), impfubyi, abakene ndetse n'uri ku rugendo (afite ibibazo); niba koko mwaremeye Allah n'ibyo twahishuriye umugaragu wacu (Muhamadi) ku munsi ukuri kwatandukanye nâ€™ikinyoma, umunsi amatsinda abiri yasakiranaga (ku rugamba rwa Badri). Kandi Allah ni Ushobora byose
